sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The GNOME Panel package contains libpanel-applet-2 libraries and applets.

sect3.title: libpanel-applet libraries
sect3.para: libpanel-applet libraries allow development of small applications which may be embedded in the panel called applets.

sect3.title: Applets
sect3.para: Applets included are Workspace Switcher, Window List, Inbox Monitor, Clock and 'Wanda the Fish'.
